Docker-Flask-Template Documentation¶

Module Documentation¶

@author : Zuicie @date : 2024-10-19

The entrypoint for starting the flask application. Ignores setting the app variable if Sphinx is building documentation.

@author : Zuicie @date : 2024-10-19

website.views.home()¶

Simple landing page. :return: HTML Template: Home page.

website.views.site_map()¶

HTML page that contains a table with all links that don’t require parameters. :return:

website.views.switch_theme(theme)¶

Allows the user to switch between default Bootswatch Themes :param theme: String of theme to load. :return: Redirect to source or home

@author : Zuicie @date : 2024-10-20

website.auth.login()¶
website.auth.logout()¶

Logs the user out and returns them to the home page. :return:

website.auth.profile()¶

Handles user account and profile information. Mostly for allowing user to change password. :return:

website.auth.signup()¶
